entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
CALM WINDS

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
